Academic Integrity: Submitting AI-generated work as original student work without proper attribution is prohibited.
Copying content from any source, including generative AI, without prior approval and adequate documentation is prohibited.
Digital Conduct and Non-Harassment: Using AI tools to manipulate media for impersonation, bullying, harassment, or intimidation is strictly prohibited.
Educator and Student Privacy: Using AI technologies to monitor classrooms (e.g., analyzing teacher-student interactions or tracking movements) without consent is prohibited.
Entering confidential or personally identifiable information into unauthorized AI tools is prohibited.
Using AI in ways that compromise teacher or student privacy or enable unauthorized data collection is prohibited.
Ethical AI Use in Education: Using AI to supplant the role of human educators in instruction or student mentorship is prohibited.
